Expected Result: Users can search furniture using keywords and filters.
Actual Result: Search returned relevant results for furniture.

Expected Result: Items can be added to the cart successfully.
Actual Result: Item added to cart without issues.

Expected Result: Users can proceed to checkout with correct order details.
Actual Result: Checkout works correctly, items and totals confirmed.

Expected Result: Payment methods (credit card, PayPal, etc.) work.
Actual Result: Payments processed correctly with successful transactions.

Expected Result: Users can register and log in successfully.
Actual Result: Registration and login both worked without errors.

Expected Result: Users can view order history and track deliveries.
Actual Result: Order history and tracking are accessible and accurate.
